Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin 1Va  (Temporin-1Va, XXA, Leu-rich; natural AMPs; UCLL1c; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: skin, Carpenter Frog,Rana virgatipes(Ranidae, Aquarana), USA, North America

Literature Information.Literature: C-terminal NH2.Activity: Active against S. aureus NCTC8325 (MIC 10 uM), MRSA T7/20,  S. epidermidis RP62A (MIC 20 uM), E. faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC 40 uM), Streptococcus group B HNTCC 80130 (MIC 20 uM), E. coli ATCC25922 (MIC 40 uM), K. pneumoniae KK3 9904 (MIC 80 uM), P.aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC 160 uM), E. cloacae HNTCC 53001(MIC 40 uM), C.albicans (MIC>160 uM).Toxicity: hemo.lytic HC50 120 uM. Updated 5/2020; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Conlon JM et al Bevier CR2005
Literature Information.Title: Purification and characterization of antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretions of the carpenter frog Rana virgatipes (Ranidae, Aquarana).
